text: @PTI_News @RahulGandhi ji - Government has taught & shown the way how to fight #COVID19 pandemic despite suffering economically with #lockdown . It's now upto common people how they take care of themselves,including you,by using Masks&keeping social distances. Come,let's fight it unitedly.

entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19
